private.title: Private Flights
private.description: Enjoy an exclusive and tailor-made service with our private flights. Monacair offers you a luxurious, fast and comfortable travel experience, adapted to your needs. Reach your destination with complete peace of mind, with premium service and total flexibility

pano.title: Panoramic Flights
pano.description: Treat yourself to an unforgettable experience by flying over the breathtaking landscapes of the French Riviera and Monaco. Our panoramic flights allow you to admire breathtaking views from the sky, in the comfort and elegance of our helicopters. A unique moment to experience or give as a gift!

regular.title: Regular Line
regular.description: Travel quickly and comfortably thanks to our regular lines. Monacair guarantees you frequent, punctual and elegant connections, notably between Monaco and Nice airport in just 7 minutes. Enjoy a premium service for a stress-free journey and peaceful arrival

jet.title: Private Jet
jet.description: Travel without limits with our tailor-made private jet service. Monacair offers you an exclusive experience, combining luxury, comfort and total flexibility. Take off at the time of your choice and reach any destination in the world with unmatched discretion and efficiency

sport.subtitle: Join the biggest events with an express private flight

gastronomie.subtitle: Land at the doors of the most prestigious restaurants

description.subtitle: Our helicopter charter services are designed to offer total flexibility. You choose your departure location, departure time, and flight destination. We take care of the rest

item1.title: Quick access to destinations
item1.description: Whether for an event, business meeting or vacation, we allow you to save precious time by avoiding traffic jams and long waits at traditional airports

item2.title: Personalized flights
item2.description: You can choose to depart from one of our bases and fly directly to your preferred destination, whether on the French Riviera, in the Alps, or any other destination on request

item3.title: Exclusive flights for a luxury experience
item3.description: Whether you're on a business trip or looking for a unique luxury experience, our private helicopters offer you exceptional views and optimal comfort. You can also organize tailor-made flights for special events, getaways or leisure activities on the French Riviera or in the Alps

bases.title: Departures from several PRESTIGIOUS bases
bases.description: Monacair offers you an exclusive helicopter charter experience to travel quickly and comfortably on the French Riviera, the Alps and beyond. Enjoy a tailor-made service with departures from our numerous bases, including Saint-Tropez, Monaco, Cannes, Courchevel, Geneva, Nice, and many others

AttractSection.title: Your Journey Starts Here
AttractSection.subtitle: Contact Monacair to benefit from an end-to-end premium service: from booking your helicopter or private jet to your arrival at destination, we take care of every detail to offer you an unforgettable flight experience

hero.title: Who Are We?
hero.subtitle: Discover the story and services of Monacair

our-history.foundation: Founded in 1988 by Stefano Casiraghi, Monacair has established itself as a leading name in helicopter transportation. Now under the leadership of Pierre and Andrea Casiraghi, the company continues to uphold a vision centered on safety, reliability, and operational excellence. These core values are reflected in every aspect of its operations, delivered with a spirit of service that combines elegance and personalized attention.
our-history.services-intro: Monacair offers a comprehensive range of premium air services, including:

services-list.item0: Private flights to all destinations in France and across Europe
services-list.item1: A regular shuttle service between Nice and Monaco
services-list.item3: Helicopter and crew management on behalf of private owners
services-list.item5: Private jet charter, providing a fully integrated travel experience

monacair-leader.title0: Monacair â€“ The Benchmark in Helicopter Travel
monacair-leader.text0:
As a European leader in luxury helicopter transport, Monacair stands as a key reference in private aviation.

With strategically positioned bases in Monaco, Cannes, Annecy, and Saint-Tropez, the company ensures both scheduled and private flights to the French Riviera, Provence, Corsica, Italy, and the Alps.

Every Monacair flight upholds a simple yet powerful promise: to deliver exceptional service at every stage of the journey.
monacair-leader.text1: From day one, Monacair has been committed to offering a truly personalised service, where safety, discretion, and comfort are always paramount. Whether it's a swift transfer between Nice Airport and Monaco, a scenic flight over the Mediterranean, or an executive business trip, each journey is crafted to meet the expectations of an international, high-profile clientele.
monacair-leader.title2: A Pledge of Reliability and Performance
monacair-leader.text2: With a modern fleet of state-of-the-art helicopters, meticulously maintained by Rotor Team, its dedicated technical subsidiary, Monacair guarantees safe, efficient and punctual operations. Each aircraft is selected for its comfort, high performance and versatility, capable of adapting to a wide range of missions.

our-services.title0: Exclusive Services, Always at Your Disposal
our-services.text0: Beyond scheduled routes and private transfers, Monacair offers a refined selection of bespoke services: VIP flights, exceptional events, sightseeing tours, tailor-made charters, and unique experiences.
our-services.title1: Where Service Meets Elegance and Precision
our-services.text1: Backed by the expertise of the Monacair Group and its key subsidiaries HÃ©li SÃ©curitÃ© and Rotor Team, the company has built lasting trust with a loyal international clientele. Professionalism, reactivity, and an unwavering attention to detail make every flight a truly exceptional experience.
our-services.title2: Complete Suite of Premium Air Services
our-services.text2: Monacair offers an extensive range of bespoke aviation solutions, designed to meet the highest standards of luxury and convenience in private air travel.

alliance.title: BHSM Alliance
alliance.subtitle: Blade, HÃ©li SÃ©curitÃ©, and Monacair unite to redefine private air travel

description.intro: The BHSM Alliance marks a significant milestone in the evolution of helicopter transport in Europe. By bringing together three industry leaders â€” Blade, HÃ©li SÃ©curitÃ©, and Monacair â€” this strategic alliance aims to deliver a unified, optimized offering focused on service excellence.

advantages.title: The BHSM Alliance enables:
advantages.item2: A seamless and consistent customer experience across the entire network,
advantages.item3: Optimal responsiveness to bespoke or last-minute requests.

description.outro: Through this collaboration, passengers gain expanded access to numerous destinations, with the assurance of a consistently high standard of service â€” regardless of departure point or operating company.

page.title: Our Fleet
page.subtitle: Discover our fleet of modern, comfortable and secure helicopters for all your travels.

intro.title: Excellence and Safety
intro.description: Monacair has a modern fleet of helicopters, regularly maintained and updated to guarantee your safety and comfort. Our aircraft are piloted by experienced professionals and meet the strictest safety standards.

safety.title: Maximum Safety
safety.description: All our aircraft undergo rigorous and regular inspections to guarantee optimal safety.

comfort.title: Premium Comfort
comfort.description: Our helicopters are equipped to offer you a comfortable and pleasant flight experience.

technology.title: Cutting-edge Technology
technology.description: Our fleet integrates the latest technological advances for safer and quieter flights.

helicopter.description: A modern and high-performance helicopter offering exceptional comfort and reliability. Ideal for all your travel needs with first-class safety and comfort features.

h130.title: Airbus H130
h130.description: The Airbus H130 (formerly Eurocopter EC130) is a light single-engine helicopter that offers exceptional comfort and panoramic views for all passengers. Ideal for transfers and panoramic flights, it combines performance, safety and elegance.

h125.title: Airbus H125
h125.description: The Airbus H125 (formerly Eurocopter AS350) is recognized for its versatility and exceptional performance. This light single-engine helicopter offers great reliability and adapts perfectly to all types of missions, from VIP transfers to panoramic flights.

h145.title: Airbus H145
h145.description: The Airbus H145 represents the pinnacle of luxury and technology. This twin-engine helicopter offers generous cabin space and exceptional comfort. Ideal for VIP flights and long-distance transfers, it guarantees a quiet and refined flight experience.

page.title: Experiences
page.subtitle: Discover Monaco and the French Riviera through exclusive and unforgettable experiences

first.title: Starred Dinner in Monaco
first.description: Experience an exceptional culinary experience in one of Monaco's most prestigious starred restaurants. After a panoramic helicopter flight, you will be welcomed for a gastronomic dinner prepared by a world-renowned chef.

featured.title: Our flagship experiences
featured.description: Discover our most popular experiences, selected for their exceptional character

dinner.title: Starred dinner and Monte-Carlo Opera
dinner.description: Start your evening with dinner at a starred restaurant in Monaco, followed by a performance at the Monte-Carlo Opera. Helicopter transport included for a complete experience.

grandprix.title: Monaco Grand Prix VIP
grandprix.description: Experience the Monaco Grand Prix like never before with VIP access, privileged seats, and a helicopter flyover during the race for a unique perspective.

provence.title: Art and Wine Day in Provence
provence.description: Discover the most beautiful museums and art galleries in Provence, followed by a tasting at a renowned wine estate. Helicopter transport to enjoy the landscapes.

page.title: Private Jets
page.subtitle: Monacair offers you a high-end private jet service, completely tailor-made, for all your destinations

AttractSection.title: Your Journey Starts Here
AttractSection.subtitle: Contact Monacair to benefit from a premium service, from booking your helicopter or private jet to your arrival at destination, we take care of every detail to offer you an unforgettable flight experience

customJets.title: TAILOR-MADE Private Jets
customJets.description: At Monacair, we know that each client has unique requirements. That's why we offer tailor-made private jets, perfectly adapted to your needs, schedules and preferences.

personalized.title: PERSONALIZED Flights
personalized.description: Choose your schedules, your itinerary and enjoy ultimate flexibility for each trip.

vip.title: VIP Service on board
vip.description: Benefit from personalized service, from booking to landing. Relax in a luxurious setting with a team dedicated to your comfort.

comfort.title: ABSOLUTE Comfort
comfort.description: Modern and fully equipped jets to guarantee your well-being throughout the flight.

discretion.title: Discretion and CONFIDENTIALITY
discretion.description: Travel in complete privacy with a discreet service that respects your privacy.

destinations.title: EXCLUSIVE Destinations and Events
destinations.description: Monacair transports you to all your dream destinations, whether for international events, business destinations or exclusive locations in Europe and beyond:

events.title: INTERNATIONAL Events
events.description: Join the most prestigious events with style and comfort.

luxury.title: LUXURY Destinations
luxury.description: Travel to exceptional places with unmatched service.

business.title: Business TRAVEL
business.description: Optimize your time with direct flights to your professional destinations.

booking.title: Book Your Private Jet Now
booking.description: Book your private jet in just a few clicks, choose your preferences and experience an extraordinary travel experience.

flexibility.title: Total Flexibility
flexibility.description: Personalized flights according to your needs, schedules and destinations.

service.title: EXCEPTIONAL Service
service.description: Enjoy the excellence of Monacair service at every step of your journey.

jets.title: MODERN Jets
jets.description: Our private jets are among the most modern and comfortable in the industry.

security.title: Maximum SECURITY
security.description: Strict safety standards and quality maintenance to guarantee a serene and secure journey.

discretion.title: Discretion and CONFIDENTIALITY
discretion.description: A tailor-made service, adapted to your needs, with the utmost respect for your privacy.

travelWith.title: Travel With Monacair: A HIGH-END Service
travelWith.description: Book your private jet with Monacair and discover the luxury of tailor-made air transport. Whether for a prestigious event or a private trip, we offer you an exclusive and personalized service.

about.title: About Monacair
about.description: Monacair is the leader in private helicopter and jet services on the French Riviera. We are committed to offering our clients luxury transport experiences, with particular attention to safety, discretion and comfort. Thanks to a modern fleet and impeccable service, each flight becomes an unforgettable moment.

travelWith.cta_text: Book your private flight today and experience an exceptional journey with Monacair.

hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: The management service offered by MONACAIR has been designed to provide you with total expertise, in order to save you time, money and spare you hassles.
hero.description: Thanks to this service, you enjoy an optimal and enriching experience with your helicopter, maintained to the strictest standards. MONACAIR handles all administrative and operational aspects related to helicopter ownership, allowing you to fully enjoy your asset with complete freedom and flexibility.
hero.trustDescription: Thanks to its neutral management, rigorous financial control and scrupulous compliance with aircraft safety and maintenance standards, MONACAIR ensures complete peace of mind.

section.title: Management
section.paragraph1: The management service offered by MONACAIR has been designed to provide you with total expertise, in order to save you time, money and spare you hassles. Thanks to this service, you enjoy an optimal and enriching experience with your helicopter, maintained to the strictest standards. MONACAIR handles all administrative and operational aspects related to helicopter ownership, allowing you to fully enjoy your asset with complete freedom and flexibility.
section.paragraph2: Thanks to its neutral management, rigorous financial control and scrupulous compliance with aircraft safety and maintenance standards, MONACAIR ensures complete peace of mind.

costControl.title: Cost Control
costControl.description: MONACAIR ensures 100% financial transparency. Its operation is based on cost rebilling â€“ you receive a copy of every invoice for expenses related to your helicopter, with personalized reports according to your needs.
benefits: Tailor-made, priority service at the best rate
Access to exceptional insurance conditions thanks to its leading fleet in Europe

helicopterSales.title: Helicopter Sales / Purchases
helicopterSales.buyDescription: If you are planning to purchase a helicopter, MONACAIR accompanies you at every stage of your process and helps you choose the aircraft perfectly suited to your needs. Our 30+ years of experience and market expertise allow us to optimize your purchasing process, taking care of market research, offer selection and negotiation to guarantee you a helicopter equipped with all the essential options.
helicopterSales.inspectionDescription: As part of our service, we carry out preliminary checks and inspections for helicopters from brands such as Airbus Helicopter, Bell, Robinson, Guimbal... to ensure the quality of each aircraft. We negotiate the best purchasing conditions for you and offer you meticulous follow-up, guaranteeing a helicopter that meets your expectations.
helicopterSales.sellDescription: Finally, our trading activity includes the sale of aircraft. If you are considering reselling your helicopter, do not hesitate to contact us to benefit from our complete support and our expertise in order to achieve a sale under the best conditions.

crewManagement.title: Crew Management
crewManagement.description: We offer a complete after-sales service, recruiting a dedicated crew, trained and certified in our academy. We can also save you recruitment costs by offering the provision of our crews.

maintenance.title: Maintenance
maintenance.subtitle: We also ensure the maintenance of your aircraft in our hangars, to guarantee that it is always ready to take off in complete safety and reliability
maintenance.description: We also ensure the maintenance of your aircraft in our hangars, to guarantee that it is always ready to take off in complete safety and reliability.
maintenance.certificationDescription: MONACAIR offers helicopter maintenance services within our subsidiary, Rotor Team, EASA 145 certified (nÂ° FR.145.0517).
maintenance.locationsDescription: Our facilities and workshops located in Grimaud, Saint-Tropez and Cannes, as well as in Annecy and Courchevel, offer you the flexibility you can expect.

charter.title: Charter / Leasing
charter.description: If you wish to make your investment profitable, we also offer you the possibility of managing the marketing of your helicopter. We operate private flights year-round in the South of France and the Alps, allowing you to benefit from our client portfolio of the Monacair Blade Heli SÃ©curitÃ© Alliance.

ctaSection.title: Interested in Our Management Service?
ctaSection.description: Contact our team to discover how our management services can save you time and money.

hero.title: Handling
hero.subtitle: Helicopter Handling Service in Monaco and Grimaud

section.title: Helicopter Handling Service in Monaco and Grimaud
section.buyDescription: Our helicopter handling / assistance service in Monaco and Saint Tropez - Grimaud is designed to offer complete and professional management of your aircraft, guaranteeing a smooth and hassle-free experience. Whether you are a helicopter owner, a company or an individual, our team of experts does everything possible to meet your specific needs with efficiency and discretion.
section.inspectionDescription: Located at the Monaco and Saint Tropez - Grimaud heliports, our handling service manages the operational aspects of your flight, from disembarkation to boarding.

description.intro: Our helicopter handling / assistance service in Monaco and Saint Tropez - Grimaud is designed to offer complete and professional management of your aircraft, guaranteeing a smooth and hassle-free experience. Whether you are a helicopter owner, a company or an individual, our team of experts does everything possible to meet your specific needs with efficiency and discretion.
description.location: Located at the Monaco and Saint Tropez - Grimaud heliports, our handling service manages the operational aspects of your flight, from disembarkation to boarding.
description.services: We offer personalized welcome and assistance in all stages of your flight, including ground logistics organization, fuel supply, as well as coordination of administrative formalities and security inspections.
description.facilities: Our modern facilities, perfectly located, are at your disposal to guarantee fast and secure service. From the arrival of your helicopter until its takeoff, every detail is handled with particular care, so that you can travel with complete peace of mind.
description.team: We also provide you with a qualified team available 7 days a week, ready to respond to all your requests, whether it's managing your time slots, coordinating with local authorities or optimizing turnaround times for your missions.
description.quality: With our helicopter handling service in Monaco and Grimaud, you benefit from high-end service quality, optimal management of your air travel and valuable time savings.
description.logistics: Let us take care of the logistics and details, while you fully enjoy your stopover in Monaco or Saint Tropez - Grimaud.

Handling.hangar: Thanks to more than 14,000 mÂ² of hangar space in Annecy, Saint Tropez, Cannes and Monaco, we offer quality service to hangar your aircraft and assist you during your stay.

servicesRecap.title: SERVICES RECAP
servicesRecap.coordination: PPR Assignment - Coordination with MonÃ©gasque and French civil aviation

privacyPolicy.title: MONACAIR Privacy Policy

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: This Privacy Policy aims to inform users of the website www.monacair.mc about how MONACAIR S.A.M. collects, uses, stores, and protects their personal data.
introduction.rgpd: The General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) No. 2016/679
introduction.monaco: MonÃ©gasque legislation on the protection of personal information (Law No. 1.165 as amended)
introduction.important: Important: By using the site, the user accepts this policy.

dataController.title: Data Controller Identity
dataController.address: Registered office: Monaco Heliport, Avenue des Ligures, 98000 Monaco

dataCollected.title: Data Collected
dataCollected.directDataTitle: Data provided directly by the user
dataCollected.directData7: Any other information communicated via our contact or booking forms
dataCollected.automaticData2: Navigation data (pages visited, connection time, browser type)

purposes.title: Collection Purposes
purposes.purpose1: Booking management and execution of transport contracts
purposes.purpose2: Customer communication (confirmation, flight tracking, practical information)
purposes.purpose3: Customer service management and request processing
purposes.purpose4: Sending commercial offers (subject to prior consent)
purposes.purpose5: User behavior analysis to improve services
purposes.purpose6: Compliance with legal and regulatory obligations

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.basis3: Consent (particularly for cookies or sending commercial offers)

recipients.title: Data Recipients
recipients.partnersDescription: Partner service providers necessary for proper service execution:
recipients.commitment: We commit to never sell your data to third parties.

security.title: Data Security
security.description: MONACAIR implements appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data against:

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.description: In accordance with applicable legislation, you have the following rights:
rights.right1: Right of access to your data
rights.right2: Right to rectification of inaccurate data
rights.right4: Right to object to processing (particularly for commercial prospecting)
rights.recourseDescription: You have the possibility to file a complaint with the Commission for the Control of Personal Information (CCIN) of Monaco.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.type1: Cookies strictly necessary for site functionality
cookies.type2: Audience measurement cookies (Google Analytics or other)
cookies.managementDescription: A banner allows you to manage your preferences during your first visit.
cookies.moreInfo: For more information: consult our Cookie Policy.

modifications.title: Policy Modifications
modifications.description: MONACAIR reserves the right to modify this Policy at any time. Any substantial modification will be notified to you via the site.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding this Policy or the exercise of your rights

privacyPolicy.footer: This privacy policy guarantees the protection of your personal data in compliance with applicable legislation.

publisher.title: Site Publisher
publisher.address: Registered office: Monaco Heliport, Avenue des Ligures, 98000 Monaco
publisher.director: Publication Director: Ms. Elodie Mekhmoukh as Marketing Director

hosting.address: Address: New York, 101 6th Ave, United States

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.description: All content present on the website www.monacair.mc, including, but not limited to, texts, images, graphics, logo, icons, sounds, software, are protected by applicable intellectual property laws and are the exclusive property of MONACAIR or its partners.
intellectualProperty.prohibition: Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, adaptation of all or part of the site elements, regardless of the means or process used, is prohibited, except with prior written authorization from MONACAIR.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.introduction: In accordance with applicable regulations (notably the General Data Protection Regulation - GDPR - and applicable MonÃ©gasque legislation), MONACAIR is committed to guaranteeing the confidentiality and security of your personal data.
personalData.purposes: Data collected on the site is used primarily for booking management, customer follow-up, commercial communications, and service improvement.
personalData.rights: You have the right to access, rectify, delete, limit processing, object, and port your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us at dpo@monacair.mc.
personalData.cookies: The site uses cookies for functionality, statistics, and user experience improvement purposes. You can manage your preferences via the cookie management banner.

responsibility.title: Responsibility
responsibility.disclaimer: MONACAIR makes every effort to ensure the accuracy and updating of information published on its site. However, it cannot be held responsible for omissions, inaccuracies, or deficiencies in updating.
responsibility.userResponsibility: The user acknowledges using the site information under their exclusive responsibility.

hyperlinks.title: Hyperlinks
hyperlinks.description: The site may contain links to other sites. MONACAIR disclaims any responsibility regarding the content, privacy policy, or practices of these third-party sites.

applicableLaw.title: Applicable Law
applicableLaw.description: These legal mentions are governed by MonÃ©gasque laws. In case of dispute, Monaco courts will have sole jurisdiction.

whatIsCookie.title: What is a cookie?
whatIsCookie.description: A cookie is a small text file placed on the user's device (computer, tablet, smartphone) when visiting a website. It allows, among other things, to store information concerning navigation and user preferences.

purposes.title: Purpose of cookies used
purposes.description: The website www.monacair.mc uses different types of cookies for the following purposes:

necessary.title: Strictly necessary cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the proper functioning of the site (e.g., memorizing language choices, access to secure areas). They do not require user consent.

analytics.title: Audience measurement cookies (statistics)
analytics.description: These cookies allow us to analyze site traffic and usage (pages visited, time spent, geographical origin) to improve user experience. We notably use services such as Google Analytics. These cookies are subject to your prior consent.

advertising.title: Advertising and personalization cookies
advertising.description: These cookies are used to offer you advertisements tailored to your interests, on our site or on third-party sites. They require your explicit consent.

management.title: Cookie Management
management.bannerDescription: During your first visit to monacair.mc, a banner informs you about cookie usage and allows you to:
management.modifyPreferences: At any time, you can modify your preferences by clicking on the "Manage my cookies" link located at the bottom of the page.
management.browserConfig: You can also configure your browser to refuse certain cookies:
management.warning: Warning: blocking certain cookies may affect your user experience.

retention.title: Cookie retention period
retention.description: Cookies placed on your device are kept for a maximum period of 13 months from their placement. Beyond this period, consent will be requested again.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: For any questions regarding this policy or cookie usage:
